Directions: In a bowl, combine steak sauce, brown sugar, soy sauce and ginger; set aside. In a skillet or wok, stir-fry steak, peppers, onion and garlic on oil for 5 minutes. Stir in reserved sauce; top with pineapple. Cover and simmer for 5 minutes. Stir in reserved sauce top with pineapple. Cover and simmer for 5 minutes or until heated through. Spoon meat mixture onto rolls; top each with two pineapple slices.
Ingredients: 1 pound boneless beef sirloin steak, cut 1/2 inch strips
1 medium sweet red pepper, thinly sliced
